sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"不幸的"之意。
means: unhappy ： 多用于表示心理状态，指由于不满意或遇到一般性倒霉事而感到不愉快。
unfortunate ： 语气较强，多指因命运不佳，意外不幸或事业失败、生活处于困境等而感到不幸。
unlucky ： 指因缺少或一时无机遇，虽作了努力，但事不从心，感到失意。
disastrous ： 着重不可避免和后果严重。

sentence.Network_en: He's been very unlucky that no chances have fallen to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很不走运，机会一次也没有落到他头上。

sentence.Network_en: Wimbledon were unlucky not to win after hitting the post twice.
sentence.Network_cn: 温布尔登队运气不佳，两次将球踢到门柱上，最终没有获胜。

sentence.Network_en: Owen was unlucky not to score on two occasions.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧文不幸两次都没有进球。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Cuss 咒骂 UnLucky 不幸的 Lucky 幸运的.
牛津初中英语8B单词_百度文库 ... unhealthy adj. 不健康的 35. unlucky adj. 倒霉的 36. unpleasant a. 使人不愉快的讨厌的 37.
Carattere  - Dizionario di Sinogrammi... ... 缓气[ get a breathing space;take a breather] 晦气[ unlucky] 秽气[ foul air].
1000个最简单常用的英语单词_百度文库 ... 不喜欢,厌恶 dislike 不走运的;不幸的 unlucky 布 cloth.

list.abs: They were overcrowded and I drew an unlucky number ., 收容所的动物已经太多了 , 而我抽到了不幸的号码.
每日30个新单词 ... ... （memory 记忆） 15. （unlucky number 不幸运的数字） 16. （lucky number 幸运数字） 17.
Friday the 13 th is an unlucky date ., 13 号的星期五是个不幸的日子.

a reformed hooker , an unlucky family , and the father and sister the hooker all suffer various rates of attrition as Judd tries to implement damage control .改革胡克，一个不幸的家庭，和父亲和姐姐的妓女都遭受不同程度的自然减员作为贾德试图执行控制损害。
Friday the thirteenth is believed to be an unlucky day ., 一般人相信十三日星期五是不吉利的日子.
如西方人用black Friday（直译为“黑色星期五” ）来描述所谓“倒霉的凶日”（unlucky day）。这种用法来源于西方的一些神话传说。

entry.def: If someone is unlucky, they have bad luck.

example.ex: Owen was unlucky not to score on two occasions...
example.tran: 欧文不幸两次都没有进球。

example.ex: Others were unlucky victims of falling debris.
example.tran: 其他人都是不幸为坠落的瓦砾残片所伤。

entry.tran: 令人不愉快的；令人遗憾的
entry.def: You can use unlucky to describe unpleasant things which happen to someone, especially when you feel that the person does not deserve them.

example.tran: 阿根廷队惜败于爱尔兰队

entry.tran: 带来坏运气的；不吉利的
entry.def: Unlucky is used to describe something that is thought to cause bad luck.

example.ex: Some people think it is unlucky to look at a new moon through glass.
example.tran: 有些人认为透过玻璃看新月是不吉利的。

means.word_mean: 2. marked by or promising bad fortune;

sentences.sentence: "their business venture was doomed from the start"
"the unlucky prisoner was again put in irons"- W.H.Prescott

auth_sentence.content: I think we were unlucky to lose the game.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think we were unlucky to lose the game.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think we were unlucky to lose the game.

auth_sentence.content: I simply assumed that I had been very unlucky.
auth_sentence.res_content: I simply assumed that I had been very unlucky.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I simply assumed that I had been very unlucky.

auth_sentence.content: Some are unlucky and are trafficked into the sex trade.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some are unlucky and are trafficked into the sex trade.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some are unlucky and are trafficked into the sex trade.

sentences.en: I was unlucky enough to lose my glasses.
sentences.cn: 昨天我非常倒霉, 竟丢失了眼镜。

means.word_mean: 不吉祥的;不顺利的;不凑巧的

sentences.en: 13 is considered a very unlucky number.
sentences.cn: 十三被看作是个很不吉利的数字。
